title: Herbal Safety
cleaned_text: The leaves and sometimes the bark of the tree. This aromatic evergreen shrub or small tree has greenish fruits and is indigenous to South America, mainly Chile and Peru. It is also found in Mexico, Ecuador, Argentina, and Morocco, among other countries.
